genresAdvancedInfo.name: german shoegaze
genresAdvancedInfo.description: German shoegaze is a subgenre of shoegaze music that originated in Germany. It is characterized by its dreamy, atmospheric soundscapes, distorted guitars, and ethereal vocals. The genre often explores themes of introspection, melancholy, and nostalgia, and is heavily influenced by bands such as My Bloody Valentine and Slowdive.
